snippet: Friends, including Stephen Fry, Martin Amis and Salman Rushdie, will gather on Friday to pay tribute to Christopher Hitchens, the author and columnist who died in December.
abstract: Friends, including Stephen Fry, Martin Amis and Salman Rushdie, will gather on Friday to pay tribute to Christopher Hitchens, the author and columnist who died in December.

headline.main: A Memorial, Ribald and Reverent, for Christopher Hitchens
headline.print_headline: An Event to Remember Christopher Hitchens
